verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

Speak \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H6942"\w* rods, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* each fathers’ house, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H2219"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w princes|strong="H3548"\w* according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fathers’ houses, twelve rods: write \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*’s name upon \w his|strong="H3588"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt write Aaron’s name \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* rod \w for|strong="H3588"\w* each \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers’ houses.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* thou shalt \w lay|strong="H7126"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w* \w up|strong="H8313"\w* \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* tent \w of|strong="H4196"\w* meeting before \w the|strong="H3947"\w* testimony, where \w I|strong="H7126"\w* meet \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* choose, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* bud: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* cease \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* murmurings \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* murmur \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w gave|strong="H4872"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* rods, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* prince \w one|strong="H3605"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers’ houses, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* twelve rods: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* rods.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w laid|strong="H4872"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rods \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* testimony.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w came|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* pass \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* morrow, \w that|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H4872"\w* into \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tent \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* testimony; \w and|strong="H4872"\w*, behold, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Aaron \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Levi \w was|strong="H4872"\w* budded, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* put \w forth|strong="H6440"\w* buds, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* bloomed blossoms, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* bare ripe almonds.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w out|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rods \w from|strong="H3068"\w* before \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* took \w every|strong="H3068"\w* man \w his|strong="H3068"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* Moses, \w Put|strong="H3615"\w* back \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Aaron \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* testimony, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* kept \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* token \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H6440"\w* rebellion; \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* mayest \w make|strong="H3615"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* murmurings \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w die|strong="H5307"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w*.

Thus \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* perish, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* undone, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* undone.

\w Every|strong="H5975"\w* \w one|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H2416"\w* cometh \w near|strong="H5975"\w*, \w that|strong="H2416"\w* cometh \w near|strong="H5975"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5975"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w*: \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* perish \w all|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* us?
